verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Huruma Bwana,
huruma kwa watu wako,
uliwakomboa kwa damu
yako takatifu. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ee Mungu unirehemu,
sawa sawa na fadhili zako.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Kiasi cha wingi wa rehema zako,
uyafute makosa yangu.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Unioshe kabisa na uovu wangu,
unitakase dhambi zangu.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ee Mungu uniumbie moyo safi,
uifanye upya roho uliyotulia
ndani yangu.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Usinitenge na uso wako,
wala roho wako mtakatifu
usiniondolee.
